FORM.SUBMITTED: Form submitted successfully. Thank you for your response!

DATA.UPDATED: Your information has been updated successfully.

AUTH.ACCESS_DENIED: Access denied. No token provided. Please log in.
AUTH.USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: A user with this email already exists. Log in or try another email.
AUTH.INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Invalid credentials. Please ensure your information is correct.
AUTH.REGISTER_FAILED: Registration could not be completed. Please try again later.
AUTH.LOGIN_FAILED: Login failed. Check your information and try again.
AUTH.ACCOUNT_BLOCKED: Your account has been blocked. Please contact support.
AUTH.INVALID_TOKEN: Invalid token. You need to log in again.

USER.ID_REQUIRED: User ID is required. Please verify the information.
USER.ERROR_DELETING: Could not delete the user. Please try again later.
USER.ACTION_FAILED: An error occurred. Please try again later.
USER.NOT_FOUND: User not found. Please verify your credentials and try again.

TEMPLATE.CREATION_ERROR: There was an error creating the template. Please try again later.
TEMPLATE.MANAGEMENT_ERROR: You do not have permission to manage this template.
TEMPLATE.ACCESS_DENIED: You do not have access to this template. Check your permissions.
TEMPLATE.FILTERING_ERROR: There was an error filtering the template. Please try again.
TEMPLATE.DELETING_ERROR: Error deleting template, please try again.
TEMPLATE.UPDATE_ERROR: Error updating template, please try again.
TEMPLATE.QUESTIONS_LIMIT: Template must have between 1 and 16 questions.
TEMPLATE.NO_TAGS: Templates must have at least one tag.

TOPIC.NOT_FOUND: Topic not found. Please ensure the link is correct.
TOPIC.CREATION_ERROR: There was an error creating the topic. Please try again later.
TOPIC.LOAD_FAILED: Failed to load topics. Please try again later.
TOPIC.DELETING_ERROR: Error deleting topic, please try again.

FORM.NOT_FOUND: Form not found. Please ensure the link is correct.
FORM.MANAGEMENT_ERROR: You do not have permission to manage this form.
FORM.ACCESS_DENIED: You do not have access to this form. Ensure you have the necessary permissions.

COMMENT.NOT_FOUND: Comment not found. Please ensure the link is correct.
COMMENT.LOAD_FAILED: Failed to load comments. Please try again later.

TAGS.LOAD_FAILED: Failed to load tags. Please try again later.

ADMIN.ACCESS_REQUIRED: Admin privileges are required for this action.
ADMIN.LOAD_FAILED: Failed to load tags. Please try again later.

LIKE.INVALID_TYPE: Invalid like type. Must be 'template' or 'comment'.

GENERAL.SERVER_ERROR: Internal server error, please try again later.
GENERAL.SEARCH_FAILED: There has been a search error, please try again.
GENERAL.PERMISSIONS_REQUIRED: Only the author or admins can perform this action.

ACCESS_SETTINGS.UPDATE_ERROR: Error updating access settings, please try again.
